Task.Param: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX swrl: <http://www.w3.org/2003/11/swrl#> PREFIX swrlb: <http://www.w3.org/2003/11/swrlb#> PREFIX bibo: <http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/> PREFIX dcelem: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX event: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX geo: <http://aims.fao.org/aos/geopolitical.owl#> PREFIX pvs: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/provenance-support#> PREFIX ero: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/> PREFIX scires: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/scientific-research#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX j.1: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/public#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX vlocal: </ontology/vivo-fis#> Construct { ?person <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person> . ?person <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?label . ?person <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/firstName> ?firstName . ?person <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#middleName> ?middleName . ?person <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/lastName> ?lastName . ?person <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#preferredTitle> ?moniker . ?person <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#email> ?email . ?person </ontology/vivo-fis#fisId> ?fisId . ?person </ontology/vivo-fis#uuid> ?uuid . ?person <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#freetextKeyword> ?keywords . } Where { ?person <http://vivo.colorado.edu/ws_fm_LABEL> ?label . ?person <http://vivo.colorado.edu/ws_fm_FIRSTNAME> ?firstName . optional { ?person <http://vivo.colorado.edu/ws_fm_MIDDLENAME> ?middleName . } ?person <http://vivo.colorado.edu/ws_fm_LASTNAME> ?lastName . optional { ?person <http://vivo.colorado.edu/ws_fm_MONIKER> ?moniker . } optional { ?person <http://vivo.colorado.edu/ws_fm_EMAIL> ?email . } optional { ?person <http://vivo.colorado.edu/ws_fm_KEYWORDS> ?keywords . } ?person <http://vivo.colorado.edu/ws_fm_FISID> ?fisId . ?person <http://vivo.colorado.edu/ws_fm_UUID> ?uuid . }
